SELECT tmp3.*,tsc.title AS schooltitle FROM (SELECT tmp1.*,tmp0.id FROM (SELECT tu.* FROM tb_user tu WHERE tu.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tu.type = 30 AND tu.deleted = 0 ) AS tmp0, (SELECT ts.id AS studentId, ts.name AS NAME, tsp.class_id AS classId, tc.title AS className, tsp.parent_id AS parentId, tsp.school_id AS schoolId FROM tb_student ts, tb_class tc, tb_student_parent tsp WHERE ts.id = tsp.student_id AND tsp.class_id = tc.id AND ts.deleted = 0 AND tsp.deleted = 0) tmp1 WHERE tmp0.school_parent_id = tmp1.parentId AND tmp0.student_id=tmp1.studentId) tmp3 LEFT JOIN tb_school tsc ON tmp3.schoolId = tsc.id
